description: [``botocore``] Fix cache implementation to reduce memory consumption.
[``botocore``] With this release, Amazon SageMaker Serverless Inference customers can use Application Auto Scaling to auto scale the provisioned concurrency of their serverless endpoints.
[``botocore``] This release adds AmazonRedshift Source and Target nodes in addition to DynamicTransform OutputSchemas
[``botocore``] This release includes support for (1) Provisioned Concurrency for Amazon SageMaker Serverless Inference and (2) UpdateEndpointWeightsAndCapacities API for Serverless endpoints.
